sentences.english: The IDC has a more uniform work function distribution than an oxide cathode.

sentences.english: The process using barium residue in three - phrase fluidized bed reactor was developed to remove sulfur dioxide from flue gas.

sentences.english: Levchenko recognized that his father not only spoke of honesty; he behaved honestly.

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the value of barium enema and CT examination in diagnosis of colonic cancer.

sentences.english: Barium slag is by-product in the manufacture of the barium salt. It belongs to the industrial waste residue.

sentences.english: A barium aluminate concrete and fancy face brick are used for radioactive rays shielding protection.

sentences.english: Objective To study the function of low - strain air- barium double contrast in the diagnosis of antral gastritis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討低張力氣鋇雙重造影在胃竇炎診斷中的作用。

sentences.english: A method for determination of trace barium in minerals by FAAS has been described.

sentences.english: Objective To assess the EKG occurring in acute barium poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討急性鋇中毒時心電圖異常的臨牀意義。

sentences.english: Cymrite is a new discovered mineral in the jadeite jade deposit of Myanma.

sentences.english: The baric clyster diagnosis to this disease and differentiate diagnose have fundamental value.

sentences.english: The barium enema showed that the configuration of the colon recovered well in most of patients.

sentences.english: This applies to all software pre-loaded into a device or just included in the BST.

sentences.english: In this paper, the quick method of determination barium content in bane salts was studied.
